question.value: Create a list of skills or interests that you have, which you can use to build a career for yourself.

data.context: In case you are not able to think of anything or if you do not have any particular skill, you can get help from Ms. Greenline (chatbot) to create your list.
data.text: Hey, I am a Grade 4 student and I want to know the career options that I have based on different skills. Can you give me any 5 options?
